title: PSA: Update your masteries before jumping into LoL games today
body:
Masteries have reset and are cool and new. So before you jump into game make sure to check them out and set up some pages for yourself =)

Here's a handy 2016 masteries guide from Phreak - https://youtu.be/VDiGkPAtups

-EDIT- For those of you that just want to look at pages and not watch a video explaining the masteries: http://imgur.com/a/kbKWH
GL HF and enjoy preseason!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Lol I went into games last time they did this thanks for the reminder! =)
How annoying..list some bloody pages..I just want to logon and have some fun..not sit around with my calculator like I am playing Eveonline.
I've edited in this album of pages to the post as well - http://imgur.com/a/kbKWH
But why? We can just look at them in the client.
Its for Beer who just wanted some template set ups to go with.
That's awesome thanks! I am just not into the theory crafting. Just want to roll into a game and have some fun.
First thing i did yesterday was change masteries :)
I wish there was an in game popup about this.  I dont always check forum before I jump on for a hit.
I just got in a game where 3 of my teammates had no masteries.
That happened to me  (i wasn't aware of reset)
Dont make Azir decide between attack speed and spell damage D: noooooo

Yeah I thought that might have happened. I went to check them out and they were empty and oh what joy it was to sit there for 45 minutes filling out all of my rune pages and reading them all, then realising that Sorcery isn't CDR any more and had to change half of them again... FUN!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

DONT GIVE ME PHREAK PLOX
GIMME SOMEONE DAT DOES GOOD PUNS PLSSSS
(AND JOKES)
i play ziggs what masteries do i take
